examples.text: Kaç yıl geçti yazık boş yere.
examples.translation: It's a shame how many years have passed in vain.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یازیق (yazık), from Old Anatolian Turkish یازق (yazuq, “sin, pity”), from Proto-Common Turkic *yāzuk (“error, mistake; sin”), a derivation from Proto-Common Turkic *yāz- (“to err”). Cognate with Azerbaijani yazıq, Gagauz yazık.
